title: Immortal Voices - Novel Updates
tags: Beast Companions   Beautiful Female Lead   Bloodlines   Cultivation   Cunning Protagonist   Demons   Doctors   Fast Cultivation   Female Protagonist   Kingdoms   Loyal Subordinates   Medical Knowledge   Multiple Identities   Power Struggle   Protagonist with Multiple Bodies   Revenge   Ruthless Protagonist   Schemes And Conspiracies   Tragic Past   Unrequited Love
author: 午夜牧羊女
description: The Honorable Demon Lord Xi Xin took over the body of a young child. In her previous life her sins were too straightforward, and she did not hide her evil deeds at all. In this life, she swears that she will not be bad out in the open. Even if people catch her handle, she must convince everyone that this is by no means her intention. She is suffering!>
